name: They Can Hear Us
description:
"They Can Hear Us," the first episode, narrates horror stories that interact with you through the microphone, playing on the fear of whoever is listening.

This is the initial chapter.

You are a magical creatures detective, and in your first case, you must go to a recently constructed house to find out what's going on and figure out what kind of creature is causing trouble.

Gameplay

This game is primarily a first-person narrative walk simulator with exploration mechanics, puzzles, and occasional conversation.



Key Features

Player voice activity to respond to conversations and experience the terror of being heard.
Atmospheric environment and graphics reminiscent of the first generation of real-time 3D graphics.
Aesthetic inspired by classic horror.
Solve puzzles while exploring the story.
